pages.text: The $(mob)Wither Skeleton$() is a variant of the $(l:minecraft_skeleton)$(mob)Skeleton$() that spawns in $(thing)Nether Fortresses$(). Compared to normal $(l:minecraft_skeleton)$(mob)Skeletons$(), it is taller, immune to fire and attacks in melee, inflicting $(thing)Wither$() on its targets.
$(mob)Wither Skeletons$() rarely drop a $(item)Wither Skeleton Skull$() on death. It can be worn, placed as a trophy or used to summon a $(l:minecraft_wither)$(mob)Wither$().
